# IgniteGigs - Design Specification

**Vibe**: Bold
**Target Audience**: Fire & LED performers + Event clients
**Generated by**: Ralph Design System

---

## Design Inspiration

| Site | Why This Audience Loves It | What to Borrow |
|------|---------------------------|----------------|
| **Dribbble** | Creative portfolios, visual-first | Card-based performer grid |
| **Patreon** | Creator empowerment, bold colors | Mission-driven messaging |
| **Airbnb** | Trust signals, clean booking flow | Review system, availability |
| **Cameo** | Celebrity booking, video-first | Video preview on hover |
| **Contra** | Freelancer empowerment, modern | Bold typography, gradients |

---

## Color Palette

```css
/* BOLD VIBE - Fire-inspired warmth + professional dark */
:root {
  /* Primary - Flame Orange */
  --primary: #FF6B35;
  --primary-hover: #E85A2A;
  --primary-active: #D14D20;

  /* Secondary - Deep Charcoal */
  --secondary: #1E1E2E;

  /* Backgrounds */
  --background: #FAFAFA;
  --surface: #FFFFFF;
  --surface-dark: #1E1E2E;

  /* Text */
  --text-primary: #1E1E2E;
  --text-secondary: #6B7280;
  --text-inverse: #FFFFFF;

  /* Borders */
  --border: #E5E7EB;
  --border-focus: #FF6B35;

  /* Status */
  --success: #10B981;
  --error: #EF4444;
  --warning: #F59E0B;

  /* Gradients */
  --gradient-fire: linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B35 0%, #F7931E 50%, #FFD700 100%);
  --gradient-led: linear-gradient(135deg, #8B5CF6 0%, #06B6D4 50%, #10B981 100%);
  --gradient-dark: linear-gradient(180deg, #1E1E2E 0%, #2D2D3D 100%);
}
```

---

## Typography

```css
/* Fonts */
--font-display: 'Sora', sans-serif;      /* Headlines */
--font-body: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif; /* Body text */

/* Scale (1.25 ratio) */
--text-hero: 56px / 64px;    /* Landing hero - 700 weight */
--text-h1: 40px / 48px;      /* Page titles - 600 weight */
--text-h2: 32px / 40px;      /* Section headers - 600 weight */
--text-h3: 24px / 32px;      /* Card titles - 600 weight */
--text-lg: 18px / 28px;      /* Lead paragraphs - 400 weight */
--text-base: 16px / 24px;    /* Body text - 400 weight */
--text-sm: 14px / 20px;      /* Captions - 400 weight */
--text-xs: 12px / 16px;      /* Labels - 500 weight */
```

---

## Spacing (8pt Grid)

```css
--space-1: 4px;    /* 0.5 units - tight */
--space-2: 8px;    /* 1 unit - internal */
--space-3: 12px;   /* 1.5 units - compact */
--space-4: 16px;   /* 2 units - default */
--space-5: 24px;   /* 3 units - comfortable */
--space-6: 32px;   /* 4 units - spacious */
--space-8: 48px;   /* 6 units - section gap */
--space-10: 64px;  /* 8 units - major sections */
--space-12: 80px;  /* 10 units - hero padding */
```

---

### Section 5: For Clients

```

â”‚     Planning an event?                                          â”‚
```

---

## Key Components

### Buttons

| Component | States | Specs |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| **Button Primary** | default, hover, focus, active, disabled, loading | `h-12 px-6 rounded-lg bg-primary text-white font-semibold` |
| **Button Secondary** | default, hover, focus, active, disabled | `h-12 px-6 rounded-lg border-2 border-primary text-primary` |
| **Button Ghost** | default, hover, focus | `h-12 px-6 text-secondary hover:bg-gray-100` |

### Cards

| Component | States | Specs |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| **Performer Card** | default, hover (lift + shadow) | `p-0 rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-md hover:shadow-xl transition-all` |
| **Feature Card** | default | `p-6 rounded-xl bg-white border border-gray-100` |
| **Testimonial Card** | default | `p-8 rounded-2xl bg-surface-dark text-white` |

### Form Elements

| Component | States | Specs |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| **Input** | empty, filled, focus, error, disabled | `h-12 px-4 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-2` |
| **Search Bar** | empty, typing, loading, results | `h-14 rounded-full shadow-lg px-6` |
| **Select** | closed, open, selected | `h-12 px-4 rounded-lg border` |

### Other Components

| Component | States | Specs |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| **Badge (Verified)** | default | `px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-success/10 text-success text-xs font-medium` |
| **Badge (Fire)** | default | `px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-orange-100 text-orange-600 text-xs` |
| **Badge (LED)** | default | `px-2 py-1 rounded-full bg-purple-100 text-purple-600 text-xs` |
| **Rating Stars** | 1-5 filled | `text-warning flex gap-0.5` |
| **Avatar** | default | `w-12 h-12 rounded-full object-cover` |
| **Video Card** | default, hover (play overlay), playing | `aspect-video rounded-lg overflow-hidden` |

---

## Tailwind Config

```javascript
// tailwind.config.js
import defaultTheme from 'tailwindcss/defaultTheme';

export default {
  content: ['./src/**/*.{html,js,svelte,ts}'],
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        primary: {
          DEFAULT: '#FF6B35',
          hover: '#E85A2A',
          active: '#D14D20',
          light: '#FFF0EB',
        },
        secondary: {
          DEFAULT: '#1E1E2E',
          light: '#2D2D3D',
        },
        surface: {
          DEFAULT: '#FFFFFF',
          dark: '#1E1E2E',
        },
        success: {
          DEFAULT: '#10B981',
          light: '#D1FAE5',
        },
        error: {
          DEFAULT: '#EF4444',
          light: '#FEE2E2',
        },
        warning: {
          DEFAULT: '#F59E0B',
          light: '#FEF3C7',
        },
      },
      fontFamily: {
        display: ['Sora', ...defaultTheme.fontFamily.sans],
        sans: ['Inter', ...defaultTheme.fontFamily.sans],
      },
      borderRadius: {
        'button': '0.5rem',
        'card': '0.75rem',
        'input': '0.5rem',
        'badge': '9999px',
      },
      boxShadow: {
        'card': '0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)',
        'card-hover': '0 10px 15px -3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)',
        'search': '0 4px 20px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)',
      },
      animation: {
        'fade-in': 'fadeIn 0.3s ease-out',
        'slide-up': 'slideUp 0.3s ease-out',
      },
      keyframes: {
        fadeIn: {
          '0%': { opacity: '0' },
          '100%': { opacity: '1' },
        },
        slideUp: {
          '0%': { opacity: '0', transform: 'translateY(10px)' },
          '100%': { opacity: '1', transform: 'translateY(0)' },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  plugins: [],
};
```

---

## Responsive Breakpoints

| Breakpoint | Width | Usage |
|------------|-------|-------|
| `sm` | 640px | Mobile landscape |
| `md` | 768px | Tablet |
| `lg` | 1024px | Desktop |
| `xl` | 1280px | Large desktop |
| `2xl` | 1536px | Extra large |

### Mobile-First Approach

- Hero headline: `text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl`
- Grid: `grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3`
- Padding: `px-4 md:px-8 lg:px-16`

---

*Design spec generated by Ralph Design System*
